title: TINY TRACTOR TINY FARM: JOHN DEERE 1025R IS KILLIN' IT!

tasks.task: Tilling and preparing garden areas using a box blade
subtasks: Lower down the ripper teeth as far as possible
Attach 70-pound weights to the box blade for added weight
Navigate uneven terrain while operating the box blade

tasks.task: Removing shrubs and bushes around the house
subtasks: Cut down shrubs to prevent branches from damaging the house
Use the box blade and stump bucket to remove stubborn shrubs and roots
Utilize the brush crusher for efficient removal of larger vegetation

tasks.task: Moving dirt and sand berms away from the house
subtasks: Operate the stump wrecker to dispose of removed shrubs and vegetation
Transport dirt and sand using the tractor and box blade
Secure the wheel spacers on the tractor for stability
Test the stability of the tractor with heavier loads (e.g., box blade, stump bucket)

tasks.task: Collecting honey and eggs as payment from Butterfly Girl photography
subtasks: Negotiate with Butterfly Girl for honey and eggs as compensation for farm work
Express willingness to try honey after the first batch
